Name: Borderline
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Punt E Mes vermouth amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Bourbon sweetened with maple syrup, soured by lemon and made more complex by vermouth.
History: Created in 2004 by James Mellor at Mint Leaf, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Borderline contains 239 calories
